title: Grand Calculated Summary Inside Repeating Section
description: A schema to showcase a grand calculated summary inside a repeating section

question.title: Do you have any outgoing costs for owning a vehicle?
Do you need to add other outgoing costs?

add_block.cancel_text: Don’t need to add any other outgoing costs?

question.title: What outgoing cost do you have?
What outgoing cost do you have?

remove_block.cancel_text: Don’t need to remove this outgoing cost?

question.title: Are you sure you want to remove this outgoing cost?
question.warning: All of the information about this outgoing cost will be deleted

title.text: What is the base monthly rate for {cost_name} for a single vehicle?

question.title: How much extra do you normally spend per month for a single vehicle?
What is your monthly expenditure per vehicle on finance?

blocks.title: We calculate the total base cost for any owned vehicle to be %(total)s. Is this correct?

title.text: How much of the {total} is paid by debit or credit card?

question.warning: The sum of these answers must not exceed the total

question.title: Do you need to add more vehicles?

add_block.cancel_text: Don’t need to add any other vehicles?

remove_block.cancel_text: Don’t need to remove this vehicle?

question.title: Are you sure you want to remove this vehicle?
question.warning: All of the information about this vehicle will be deleted

title.text: What is your monthly expenditure on maintenance for your {vehicle_name}?
What is your monthly expenditure on fuel for your {vehicle_name}?
We calculate the monthly running costs of your {vehicle_name} to be %(total)s. Is this correct?
The total cost of owning and running your {vehicle_name} is calculated to be %(total)s. Is this correct?

contents.description: Currently this question is not revisited when the grand calculated summary changes. When grand calculated summary dependencies are implemented, this guidance should be removed, and this block should become incomplete upon the GCS changing.

title.text: How do you pay for the monthly fees of {vehicle_cost}?

question.warning: These answers must add up to the total owning and running cost

title.text: You have provided the following information about monthly expenditure for your {vehicle_name}.

list.text: Total owning and running cost: {total}
